column6: Responsible for Core Services, Quality and Communications, Feed Additives Research and Enforcement, Legislation and "Post Authorisation Surveillance" including the Suspected Adverse Reaction Surveillance Scheme, the Residues Surveillance Unit, the Animal Medicines Inspectorate and the Inspections Team. Reports to the Chief Executive.

column6: Responsible for  Pharmaceuticals and Feed Additives, Biologicals, Licensing Administration, the Co-Ordination Team and Information Technology. Reports to the Chief Executive.
